channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [ERI/LIM][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 8, 04:30 - 08:30 UTC

Jun 26, 22:46 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud.

Start time : 08/07/2024 04:30 UTC
End time : 08/07/2024 08:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers may experience micro cuts during the maintenance.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are going to update the server to a newer and more stable version.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - Vmotion
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 8, 06:00 UTC  -  Jul 12, 16:00 UTC

Jun 19, 22:40 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 08/07/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 12/07/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 3, 07:00 - 15:00 UTC

Jun 11, 23:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 03/07/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 03/07/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : The backup and restore service will unreachable during this maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade Storage Servers BSD.

Thank you for your understanding.

Start time : 02/07/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 02/07/2024 13:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

Jun 18, 18:35 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 18, 18:34 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our "Product impacted" offer.

This will temporarily affect some services availability.

Start time : 18/06/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 21/06/2024 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Veeam Cloud Connect unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will operate on our Veeam Cloud Connect product in Canada and Europe.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][HostedPrivateCloud] - Migrate vScope backend to new architecture
item.description:
Jun 20, 14:08 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 18, 09:19 UTC
Update - SBG2A and ERI1C are done.We are going to work with SBG1A and RBX1A PCC zones at 10:00 UTC

Jun 18, 07:05 UTC
Update - We would like to inform you that we are going to start the second wave at 07:00 UTC on SBG2A, ERI1C, LIM1 PCC zone.

Jun 17, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 12, 02:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 17/06/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 21/06/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Some call apiv6 & ovhplugins won't be functional during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out a replacement of our vScope backend.
This maintenance will be rolled out in several zones.
First wave will be on Monday 17/06/2024 on BHS1A / GRA2A and WAW1C and will be carried out after zone by zone.


Thank you for your understanding.
